TopicTitle: What timezone (in GMT) do you live in?

Articles.Content:
Just a quick question, to see how different the places we live in really are.

 As a Southeast-Asian, the country I live in is in the timezone of GMT +8:00. What about you guys?

GMT -3

Chile, now with the same timezone as Argentina!

(We recently stopped using DST)
<--- See location. (Really -2.5 now that we're in DST)
Very much GMT (my longitude is 0.0396Ã‚Â° E) but currently on BST which is +1 hour.
East coast of the greatest country ever (USA) GMT -5 like the skrub above me.

-26.5. I live in the Twilight Zone, and it's surprisingly nice. Come by sometime, we have ice cream, billiards, telepathic kids, and even movies where if you wish to be in them hard enough you will actually become part of the movie! We also have daily readings from the Only and Holy Book of the Three Holy, Powerful, Almighty Stooges and used bookstores, antique shops, and military surplus outlets abound. We also have the best dirt anywhere, we can grow any crop in a day and a full-sized Redwood tree in a month.
I'm On Gmt 0 the best kind \*wishpers\* the real time.
UTC+2h at the moment, because of the daylight saving. Usually it's UTC+1h.
